message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this valuable product for $12,000. I believe it offers significant value and I'm happy to discuss further if you have any questions.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $9,000 is a bit low for me, I'm willing to come down to $11,000.  I believe this price reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me at $9,500?
